channel.title: Help me find the name of a song.
channel.description:
There's a song I've been looking for, for years. I couldn't find it anywhere. Today I found a song that is very similar, so maybe you can help me, this is the only clue I have, because I don't remember the melody nor the lyrics of the song I'm looking for: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JmcA9LIIXWw']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JmcA9LIIXWw[/url]
It's like that, but even "countrier"(Country style). It's a VERY famous song, I mean, I listen to it in the radios of Argentina, so it must be very popular in USA(Although it seems it's old). The singer is a male, I think it's got an organ too.

item.title: Help me find the name of a song.
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
Giazzo:

If you have Shazam on your mobile, the moment it is played it will find the name instantly.

But SoundHound is even better: it can find the name by simply humming the motif to the mobile.

If you’re desperate, I suggest you try these out.

Yeah, I would but I don’t even remember the melody. I only remember it when I’ve just listened to it, then I suddenly forget everything. It’s terrible.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me find the name of a song.

item.title: Help me find the name of a song.
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
None of those is the one I’m looking for… Lol, I wouldn’t imagine it would be so hard. If I could listen to it again I would give you more clues, but I don’t know when is it going to be played again on the radio. Think about this: It had an organ(or harmonic) playing during the chorus or just before it.

Read full topic

Here’s one that has some semblance of the beginning
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-dt5BNr0S0g
